configurator.description: Chronos offers lots of customization options to make the app fit your needs. Test the look with different options on different platforms right here:
configurator.headline: Highly customizable

ctaSection.description: Download the app for your platform and start tracking your time in Jira.
ctaSection.headline: Get started with Chronos

adminPermissions.answer:
Chronos technically connects with your account and not with your workspace. That means that it should work without admin permissions. It does require Jira worklogs to be enabled though and there are a few edge cases where admins can prevent usage of apps like Chronos.

If our time tracker doesn't work on your workspace then let us know and we will take a look at it. You can also request a refund through Apples “report a problem” platform.
adminPermissions.question: Does Chronos require admin permissions in Jira?

builtWith.answer: Chronos is built withReact Native macOS and therfore offers a native experience with a small footprint.
builtWith.question: What technologies is Chronos built with?

freeAlternative.answer:
We know that there are apps with a similar feature set (e.g. Timkee) and recommend them if you are looking for a free alternative. We have also tried these and found them difficult to use and/or inadequate for our use case. For example, one feature that almost all of them are lacking is the ability to add multiple accounts.

Please also keep in mind that this is a side project of a relatively small team of two developers. All of our revenue is used for the Apple developer license, web hosting and our domain.

If you really want to try our app without paying for it, you can always clone our GitHub repository and build it yourself.
freeAlternative.question: Why does this app cost money when there are free alternatives?

otherThenJira.answer: Chronos is specifically designed for Jira and does not support other services. We are thinking about adding other services in the future, but for now we are focusing on Jira.
otherThenJira.question: Can I use Chronos with other services than Jira?

supportedPlatforms.answer: Chronos is only available on macOS for now. We currently have no plans to release it on other platforms, but we do have a Windows build laying around. If you are missing a specific platform or are interested in the Windows build then please let us know.
supportedPlatforms.question: Which platforms are supported?

whatIsChronos.answer: Chronos is a time tracking app for Jira. It helps you to manage your daily Jira worklogs in an easy and intuitive way.
whatIsChronos.question: What is Chronos?

foundBug.answer: You can contact us via email at {SUPPORT_EMAIL} or through our GitHub repository.
foundBug.question: I found a bug. Where can I report it and get help?

iWantToHelp.answer: Thank you for your interest in contributing to Chronos. You can contribute by reporting bugs, suggesting features or even by contributing to the codebase. You can do this through our GitHub repository.
iWantToHelp.question: I want to help developing this further. How can I contribute?

missingFeatures.answer: Yes, we are always looking for feedback and feature requests. Please let us know what you are missing and we will try to add it in a future release.
missingFeatures.question: I am missing a specific feature. Can you add it?

notWorkingRefund.answer: If our time tracker doesn't work on your workspace then let us know and we will take a look at it. You can also request a refund through Apples “report a problem” platform.
notWorkingRefund.question: The app is not working for me. Can I get a refund?

supportLanguage.answer: You can write us in English or German. We will try to answer in the same language.
supportLanguage.question: In which languages do you offer support?

manualSubmit.description: Take a look at your worklogs and make adjustments before you submit them.
manualSubmit.headline: Manual submit

multipleAccounts.description: Manage worklogs from different accounts and workspaces.
multipleAccounts.headline: Connect multiple accounts

startStop.description: Start and stop your timers as you go. Track the actual time that you are working on a task.
startStop.headline: Start/stop tracking

heroShineTop.description: Use the Chronos app to manage your daily Jira worklogs in an easy and intuitiv way. Stop the time waste of time tracking.
